title.rendered: Amazon Working Capital and Cashflow Forecasting with Alan Chen of Freecashflow.io

content.rendered:
Podcast: Play in new window | Download (Duration: 42:10 — 38.6MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | RSS

Podcast (10k-podcast): Play in new window | Download (Duration: 42:10 — 38.6MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | TuneIn | RSS

Alan is a Certified Public Accountant and one of the founding partners of FreeCashFlow.io a leading accounting and consulting agency based out of Los Angeles, California, and they are focused on one niche and niche only: Online and Ecommerce business owners. 

Check out his Facebook page

Book a consulting call: https://www.freecashflow.io/book/

Check out our course Tax Free Ecom: HyperDrive Your After-Tax Profit here

Discount Promo: For the listening audience of Amazing FBA Podcast, we are offering an exclusive discount code of 20% off the Course Fee. Please use code “amazingfba-20” 

 

Download your FREE checklists here:

Ultimate Guide to 9 of the Most Crucial ECOM Tax Deductions

Official Tax Planning Guide

 

You’ll Learn:

  • The Working Capital requirements
  • What happens with poor management of inventory or receivables
  • How to set up a CF projection
  • How to Foresee costs
  • The 3 things to look for in your cash flow projection
